Posts.Content: Jul 11, 2013 11:36AM jadore wrote: You must be feeling very upset, confused and worried.  Have you contacted another doctor for a second opinion?  Can you go to a facility that specializes in IBC ?  So sorry that you are going through this.  Keeping you in my prayers.
